newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Monsanto Q4 EPS view cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Monsanto Q4 EPS view cut.

text.p: -- NatWest Securities Corp said it reduced its fourth quarter earnings estimate to $0.13 a share from $0.17 a share, but is maintaining its full year 1996 estimate at $1.46.
-- Earlier, Monsanto reported third quarter earnings of $0.28 a share, above the consensus of of $0.24 a share.

-- "Earnings surpassed expectations due to the early timing of bulk aspartame shipments and due to a lower tax liability," NatWest wrote in a report. "As these factors are likely to mean a slightly reduced outlook for the next quarter, we are adjusting our (fourth quarter) estimate downward."
-- NatWest said it believes Monsanto will announce a spinoff of its chemical business in the fourth quarter.
-- Monsanto previously announced it is weighing options for its chemical business, including spinning it off as a separate company or merging it with another firm.

-- "Monsanto announced in its conference call that restructuring charges relating to chemicals are likely to occur in (the fourth quarter), indicating to us that a spin out/sale announcement is imminent," NatWest said. "As the chemical group has a lower projected growth rate than the rest of Monsanto's businesses, we believe the separation of this business will provide a boost to Monsanto's core growth rate."
